Package ru.alvisid.pacs.repository

Interface EmployeeRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TypicalRepository<Employee>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataJpaEmployeeRepositoryImpl
    public interface EmployeeRepository
extends TypicalRepository<Employee>
    The generalized functional for employee's repository.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Glushkov Evgeniy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Employee> getAllByDeptId​(int deptId)
      Returns the list with all employees by department's id.
      java.util.List<Employee> getAllByPositionId​(int posId)
      Returns the list with all employees by position's id.
      Employee getByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Returns an employee by given email.
      Employee getWithDeptAndPosition​(int id)
      Returns an employee with filled fields: department and position by specified id.

      Saves or updates a given object with inserted parameters.

      • Methods inherited from interface ru.alvisid.pacs.repository.TypicalRepository

        delete, get, getAll, save

    • Method Detail

      • save

        Employee save​(Employee employee,
              int deptId,
              int positionId)
        Saves or updates a given object with inserted parameters.
        Parameters:
        employee - the object to save or update.
        deptId - department's id, the department will be inserted to the object's department field.
        positionId - position's id, the position will be inserted to the object's position field.
        Returns:
        a saved or update object, null - if there aren't updated object in the data base.

      • getAllByDeptId

        java.util.List<Employee> getAllByDeptId​(int deptId)

        deptId - the department's id.
        Returns:
        the list with all employees by department's id.

      • getByEmail

        Returns an employee by given email.
        Parameters:

      • getWithDeptAndPosition

        Employee getWithDeptAndPosition​(int id)
        Returns an employee with filled fields: department and position by specified id.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the employee with filled fields: department and position.
